channel.title: Server voting page
channel.description:
Yes, one of those sites like Xtremetop100 how you vote your your private servers, and they rank higher and attract players.
Can mopar make one of these? dedicated to runescape, throw some google ads on there and he will be bringin in some money. as well as people see what servers are hot etc.

item.title: Server voting page
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote="_ikram, post:4, topic:281106"][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=371211.msg2804943#msg2804943 date=1243672422]
As in add a voting system for the server status page? Or do something different entirely?
[/quote]

Yeh, you should make it one the status page make a button where poeple can vote, and only allow 2 votes per Ip.[/quote]

If you guys need any help for ppl who reset there router , so they can’t cheat
ask

Georgio cuz i mostly cheat on runelocus i vote 300 a day sometimes 200 xD sometimes not ;p

Read full topic

item.title: Server voting page
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:5, topic:281106”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=371211.msg2804943#msg2804943 date=1243672422]
As in add a voting system for the server status page? Or do something different entirely?
[/quote]Look at it this way; the more ads, the more money. If you added the voting option on another page, there would be more ads total.[/quote]

I agree 100%
